div.div:
Susan - June 10, 2012 - Version 1.5c
Am satisified with this
App...Its been with me for 3 yrs and has saved me several times. No complaints. Good app!!!

Matt - January 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.5c
Great app
I'm requesting shell integration. In other words, when a user long presses on a .RAR file, we should have the option to extract right there. Flawless otherwise.

Ueli - December 12, 2011 - EeePad Transformer TF101 with version 1.5c
great
great app, fastest (in my opinion) unrar-app. only thing missing for 5th star: app doesn't remember which sourcce-directory i used last (nor does it have a setting to choose it)

A.J., Wendy's, Peanut Head, Armadillo, Monkey Boy, Chico, Kid, Disturbed Kid, Bob Saget - April 27, 2012 - Version 1.5c
Crap
Use to work on my phone for a week, now whenever i press unrar it just automatically crashes -Pantech Burst

James - January 18, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.5c
Works great.
Basically paid to do passworded files, but it worksfine as of now. epic 4g touch

Matt - April 4, 2012 - Version 1.5c
Invaluable
Thank you so much for making this! This is the only app I could find that could properly unrar a password protected rar file. And it worked great!

strass - March 20, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.5c
Nice rar
Works great open some downloads i thought were lost nice rar

Denislav - June 7, 2012 - Version 1.5c
best app
work great

A must have app

Tested the crap out of this and its been flawless. Unpacked 60mb file in ...
Tested the crap out of this and its been flawless. Unpacked 60mb file in less than 15 seconds! Passworded files work perfectly! Sporting a Nexus S.
